title: Wahoo to Shut Down RGT Virtual Cycling App Just 18 Months After They Bought it
content:
The virtual riding app will close at the end of the month, with Wahoo offering users up to a free one-year Zwift subscription.

Read the full article at Wahoo to Shut Down RGT Virtual Cycling App Just 18 Months After They Bought it on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
